summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Thistle Street from Beacon Avenue to 42nd Avenue South; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16525 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
